alert.note: Alert for Sierra Madre Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 04 at 2:55PM MDT until April 06 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mountain snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting in excess of 75 mph. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Falling and blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Hikers and snowmobilers can easily become disoriented and lost. Near blizzard conditions are possible due to very strong winds.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
